plot: If everyone brands you a certain kind of person, and feels that way despite your efforts to the contrary, do you really know who are in the first place? The film chronicles a high schooler as he journeys through a series of meetings with his parents and teachers, who try to change the way he lives his life. He then begins to wonder if it actually does need to be changed, for better or worse.   Written by  Anonymous
title: This Is Me
